entries.name: patterns/idioms
entries.content:
# Batch Idioms

## Use SetLocal

```bat
@echo off
setlocal EnableExtensions EnableDelayedExpansion
```

## Quote paths

```bat
if exist "%~f0" echo Running
```

## Prefer CALL for subroutines

```bat
call :do_work
exit /b

:do_work
  echo Work
  exit /b
```

entries.name: formatters/overview
entries.content:
# Batch Formatters

No widely adopted formatter for Windows Batch scripts.

entries.name: linters/overview
entries.content:
# Batch Linting

There is no widely adopted modern linter for Windows Batch scripts.
